text: The Strange Passenger (Spanish: La extraña pasajera) is a 1953 Mexican mystery film directed by Fernando A. Rivero and starring Emilia Guiú, Víctor Manuel Mendoza and Tito Junco.Amador p.126 ==Cast== * Emilia Guiú as Yolanda * Víctor Manuel Mendoza as Rodolfo Castillo * Tito Junco as El dandy * Miguel Ángel Ferriz as Coronel Macías * Arturo Soto Rangel as Auditor Camacho * José Ángel Espinosa 'Ferrusquilla' as Lucas Soriano * José Torvay as Negrete, detective de banco * Antonio Bravo as Tomás Pizarro * Roberto Corell as Agente Benitez * Dalia Íñiguez as Beata * Irlanda Mora as Hija de beata * José Luis Rojas as Esteban Fuentes * Maricruz Olivier as Carmela * Pedro Galván as Jorge Morales, banquero * León Barroso as Empleado de tren * José Chávez as Subteniente * Maria Aurelia de Torres as Vendedora de comida * Rogelio Fernández as Detective Cortina * Eulalio González as Conductor de tren * Jesús Gómez as Militar * Ana María Hernández as Abuela en tren * Elodia Hernández as Pasajera en tren * Álvaro Matute as Germán, mesero * Ángel Merino as Militar * Ignacio Peón as Pasajero en tren * Carlos Robles Gil as Pasajero en tren == References == == Bibliography == * María Luisa Amador. Cartelera cinematográfica, 1950-1959. UNAM, 1985. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1950s mystery films Category:Mexican mystery films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Fernando A. Rivero
title: The Strange Passenger
